Text.val: Program demonstrates some strange behaviour caused by using link joins
Child tasks are identical except for the types of link used
For some reason null dates in the main table get a 01.01.0001 value
when the link join is used.
1 main file IUNP link join on both INVO and CLNT
2 main file IUNP link query on both INVO and CLNT
3 main file IUNP link join on INVO, link query on CLNT
